name: Pyracrifice
description:
You are the architect of Egypt’s Ra, our God wants a new Pyramide to celebrate his greatness. You have 3 months, be quick and efficient. To achieve your goal, you shall use stones and perform sacrifices to build the great Pyramid’s Ra.

Credits :
